actions.name: Petrify

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

Effect: All valid creatures within Range lose -1 SPD stage for 5 activations. The user's Intimidate Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.
